name: EvilNum Golden Chickens Deployment via OCX Files
description: Detects Golden Chickens deployment method as used by Evilnum in report published in July 2020
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Ss].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Ii].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Oo][Cc][Xx].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*regsvr32* AND process.command_line:*\/s* AND process.command_line:*\/i* AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\* AND process.command_line:*.ocx*)`
